DOC.criteria: Healthy male female subject . Age 1845 year . Body mass index 1827 kg/m2 Vital sign within normal range 5 minute supine position ( SBP : ≥90 mmHg ≤140 mmHg , DBP : ≥45 mmHg ≤90 mmHg , Heart rate : ≥45 bpm ≤90 bpm ) . Normal ECG ( PRinterval ≤ 210 m , QRS duration ≤ 140 m , QTc ≤ 450 m ) . Adequate bone marrow function evidence absolute neutrophil count ≥1500 cells/µl , normal red blood cell index , hemoglobin great 11 g/dl platelet count great 150,000/µl . Normal renal function . Normal hepatic function evidence serum total bilirubin ≤1.2 mg/dl , less equal upper limit normal , alkaline phosphatase less equal upper limit normal , ASAT ALAT less equal upper limit normal . Normal coagulation profile , activate partial thromboplastin time ( aPTT ) . Normal urine analysis . Signed informed consent . Intake steroid within 2 week prior first dose study drug . Concomitant medication ( especially anticoagulants aspirin ) herbal supplement . Active infection , fever > 38.5°C within three day prior first schedule day study drug dose . Known hypersensitivity component turmeric . Participation another clinical trial within 4 week study initiation . NYHA Class 2 congestive heart failure , uncontrolled hypertension , arrhythmia .
